p: Rearing earthworms on the substrate, including BSF leftovers did not produce any negative impact on the animal biomass; on the contrary the highest trend in the biomass increase over time was recorded in the BSF thesis with respect to the addition of the simple fruit and vegetable mix ( Table 8). However, the number of earthworms obtained at the end of our experiment tended to be the lowest in the BSF thesis, although again difference with VMD was not significant. Earthworms left in the boxes containing only peat significantly decreased in their number and biomass, because of starvation leading part of them to death ( Table 8).
